sentences.en: Alterations occur at the interface between white blood calls and endothelium.
sentences.cn: 白细胞和内膜的交界面发生改变.

sentences.en: At each interface the spreading wavefront is made discontinuous.
sentences.cn: 在每一分界面上扩展的波前出现间断.

sentences.en: At the same time, interface standards also benefIt'software vendors.
sentences.cn: 同时, 界面标准也有利于软件开发商.

sentences.en: In early stages of design, pretend the interface is magic.
sentences.cn: 在设计的早期阶段, 假设界面有魔术效应.

sentences.en: Liquid water can leach soluble materials from the interface.
sentences.cn: 液态水能够从界面溶解出可溶性物质.

sentences.en: My computer has a network interface, which allows me to get to other computers.
sentences.cn: 我的计算机有网络接口可以与其它计算机连在一起.

sentences.en: Similarly, the status of user interface objects should be apparent to users.
sentences.cn: 类似地, 用户界面对象的状态也应该对用户是显而易见的.

sentences.en: The different components all have to interface smoothly.
sentences.cn: 不同的部件都必须能顺利接合。

sentences.en: the interface between computer and printer
sentences.cn: 计算机和打印机之间的接口

sentences.en: The new version of the program comes with a much better user interface than original.
sentences.cn: 新版程序的用户界面比原来程序的好得多.

sentences.en: The reaction occurs mainly on the interface between the two reacting phases.
sentences.cn: 反应主要发生在两反应相之间的交界面上.

sentences.en: The system uses an impressive graphical interface.
sentences.cn: 这一系统采用了特别好的图形界面。

sentences.en: This is one of the most frequently violated principles in user - interface design.
sentences.cn: 在用户界面设计中,这是人们违反得最多的原则之一.

sentences.en: This program has perspicuous interface and extensive application.
sentences.cn: 该程序界面明了，适用范围广。

sentences.en: We will concentrate here on the direct interface to a television - type display.
sentences.cn: 下面我们将集中探讨对电视型显示器的直接接口.

words.tran_cn: [力][自][地物]界面；[通信][计]接口；[物化]接触面

phrases.tran_cn: 人机接口；人机联系装置；人机联系
输出接口；輸出界面；输出介面

trans.tran_en: the way in which you see the information from a computer program on a screen, or how you type information into the program

trans.tran_cn: （使通过界面或接口）接合，连接，[计算机]使联系
trans.tran_en: if you interface two parts of a computer system, or if they interface, you connect them

trans.tran_cn: 相互作用（或影响），交流，交谈
